parameter-group.name: telnetSettings
parameter-group.label: Telnet Settings
parameter-group.description: Settings for the Telnet port of the AVR

parameter-group.name: httpSettings
parameter-group.label: HTTP Settings
parameter-group.description: Settings for the HTTP port of the AVR

parameter.name: zoneCount
parameter.label: Zone Count of the Receiver
parameter.description: Number of zones (including main zone), values 1-3 are supported.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: AVR Host or IP Address
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the AVR to control.

parameter.name: telnetEnabled
parameter.label: Use Telnet Port
parameter.description: By using telnet the AVR updates are received immediately. Also, some devices only support telnet. However, the AVR only allows 1 simultaneous connection. Uncheck if you are using dedicated apps to control the AVR. Then HTTP polling is used instead.

parameter.name: telnetPort
parameter.label: Telnet Port
parameter.description: Telnet port used for AVR communication. Normally shouldn't be changed.

parameter.name: httpPort
parameter.label: HTTP Port
parameter.description: HTTP Port used for AVR communication. Normally shouldn't be changed.

parameter.name: httpPollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Refresh interval of the HTTP API in seconds (minimal 5)

channel-group-type.label: Zone Control
channel-group-type.description: Channels for a zone of this AVR.

channel-type.label: Power (zone)
channel-type.description: Power ON/OFF this zone of the AVR

channel-type.label: Volume

channel-type.label: Volume (dB)
channel-type.description: Set the volume level (dB). Same as [mainVolume - 80].

channel-type.label: Mute
channel-type.description: Enable/Disable Mute on this zone of the AVR

channel-type.label: Input Source
channel-type.description: Select the input source for this zone of the AVR

channel-type.label: Surround Program
channel-type.description: Select the surround program of the AVR

channel-type.label: Now Playing (artist)
channel-type.description: Displays the artist of the now playing song.

channel-type.label: Now Playing (album)
channel-type.description: Displays the album of the now playing song.

channel-type.label: Now Playing (track)
channel-type.description: Displays the title of the now playing track.

channel-type.label: Send a Custom Command
channel-type.description: Use this channel to send any custom command, e.g. SITV or MSSTANDARD (check the protocol documentation)
